info.name: ArchLinux.org Dark
info.description:
A dark theme for ArchLinux.org, with inspiration from Solarized Dark.

Affects the following pages:
- Home
- Packages
- Bugs
- Security
- AUR
- Download

May or may not have an effect on the other pages. I might complete this later.
info.additionalInfo:
v0.1 Add Home, Package List, Packages, AUR pages
v0.2 Add TODO pages
v0.21 Hotfix for <select> elements
v0.22 Hotfix for Packages' Page Exact Search Box, and AUR Package comments
v0.3 Add Bugs, Security, and Download pages
v0.31 Fix Security not being highlighted when on security.archlinux.org
